abstract: Saudi Prince Alwaleed bin Talal places four-page letter on his website, along with Twitter post, saying it is time Saudi Arabia ends its ban on women driving; while Prince Alwaleed has higher profile than much of Saudi royalty, he has no position in government and his stance is unlikely to affect policy.
lead_paragraph: “Beyond being a rights issue, it is also an economic, developmental and social one,” Alwaleed bin Talal wrote in a four-page letter posted on his personal website.
snippet: “Beyond being a rights issue, it is also an economic, developmental and social one,” Alwaleed bin Talal wrote in a four-page letter posted on his personal website....

headline.main: Let Women Drive, a Prince in Saudi Arabia Urges
headline.print_headline: Let Women Drive, a Saudi Prince Urges
